com.bah.ode.wrapper

Class HttpClientFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bah.ode.wrapper.HttpClientFactory

  • public class HttpClientFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides an abstraction layer for making HTTP and HTTPS connections to an HTTP server. Follow the steps below to create an HTTP client and send HTTP requests to the HTTP server.
    1. Call build(SSLContext) to create a factory instance. This factory can be used to create individual HTTP connections to an HTTP Server.
    2. Use the obtained factory from step 1 to create a HttpClientFactory.HttpClient object by calling createHttpClient() method.
    3. Use HttpClientFactory.HttpClient object to send HTTP GET, POST and other requests to the server using HttpClientFactory.HttpClient.get(String, Map, Map), HttpClientFactory.HttpClient.post(String, Map, Map, String) methods.
    4. Use the returned HttpClientFactory.HttpResponse object to retrieve the various components of a response including: HttpClientFactory.HttpResponse.getBody() and HttpClientFactory.HttpResponse.getStatusCode()

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  HttpClientFactory.HttpClient 
      class  HttpClientFactory.HttpException 
      class  HttpClientFactory.HttpResponse
      Encapsulates an HTTP Response containing the statusCode and body of the response which would be the resource returned by a REST call.

      • build

        public static HttpClientFactory build(javax.net.ssl.SSLContext sslContext)
                               throws HttpClientFactory.HttpException
        Builds HttpClientFactory object which is used to create HttpClientFactory.HttpClient object.
        Parameters:
        sslContext - with which the client factory to be built.
        Returns:
        HttpClientFactory object
        Throws:
        HttpClientFactory.HttpException - if building the socket factory fails.

      • buildSSLConnectionSocketFactory

        private static org.apache.http.conn.ssl.SSLConnectionSocketFactory buildSSLConnectionSocketFactory(javax.net.ssl.SSLContext sslContext)
        Builds a SSLConnectionSocketFactory object
        Parameters:
        sslContext - with which the client factory to be built.
        Returns:
        SSL connection factory object that is used to create SSL socket connections.
